pullrequest.title: Fix for 1.3 tests, added some more error messages, fixed compile warnings

content.html:
what about

  if (!_parent)
  {
    gzerr << "Create a visual, invalid parent!!!\n";
    return;
  }
  else
  {
     pnode = _parent->GetSceneNode();
     if (!pnode)
     {
       gzerr << "Unable to get parent scene node\n";
       return;
     }
  }

feels a little more modular
